messages.message: pixelWidth and pixelHeight must be multiples of 4 for KHR_texture_basisu compatibility.
messages.details: pixelWidth is 14 which is not an integer multiple of 4 as required for KHR_texture_basisu compatibility.

messages.message: pixelWidth and pixelHeight must be multiples of 4 for KHR_texture_basisu compatibility.
messages.details: pixelHeight is 14 which is not an integer multiple of 4 as required for KHR_texture_basisu compatibility.
